channel.title: NPC Error
channel.description:
ok, i was putting new models and npc's into a client, such as mithril dragon, both forms of kalphite queen, etc, and it compiled fine... but then i tried the source associated with that client, and it went crazy! (the server was already running when i compiled the client). i retried the runserver, and it said this:
[code]Devolution Server 7.0 - Created by Winten/Bakatool ------------------------------------------------------- Loading npcs... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsExcept ion: 5000 at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:1390) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:424) at server.main(server.java:99) [/code]
ok, it says there is a problem at line 1390 in NPCHandler... this is what that line section says:
[code] combatLevel[Integer.parseInt(token3[0])] = Integer .parseInt(token3[2]); [/code]
(line 424 just says "load(NPC.cfg)" and server.java must have to do with the handler...)
so, how do i fix this?

item.title: NPC Error
item.dc:creator: @R4ND0M R4ND0M
item.description:
@R4ND0M wrote:

ok, i was putting new models and npc’s into a client, such as mithril dragon, both forms of kalphite queen, etc, and it compiled fine… but then i tried the source associated with that client, and it went crazy! (the server was already running when i compiled the client). i retried the runserver, and it said this:

[code]Devolution Server 7.0 - Created by Winten/Bakatool

Loading npcs… Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsExcept
ion: 5000
at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:1390)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:424)
at server.main(server.java:99)
[/code]

ok, it says there is a problem at line 1390 in NPCHandler… this is what that line section says:

combatLevel[Integer.parseInt(token3[0])] = Integer .parseInt(token3[2]);

(line 424 just says “load(NPC.cfg)” and server.java must have to do with the handler…)

so, how do i fix this?

Read full topic
